articles.content: Toyotas commercial truck business and Stellantis are under fire for cheating emissions controls like its 2015 again, Ferraris order books are breaking records, and Renault is going to follow its hear… [+9199 chars]

articles.author: Justine Calma
articles.title: Amazon's climate pollution is getting way worse - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon's pollution continues to grow despite its promises to address climate change. The company's carbon footprint is significantly larger since pledging to reach net-zero emissions.
articles.content:
Don't be fooled by the climate PR
